Negative_Review: No tea or coffee making facilities in room Just one small disappointment my daughter and I arranged with the front desk staff to order a taxi to take us to the airport after asking for an estimate of how much the fare would be We ended up with a hotel transfer by van which became clear on the receipt we received at the end of the journey and which was double what we expected to pay Happily the hotel have met the difference in cost between the two fares They have been very pleasant to deal with over this issue Suggest that travellers make themselves aware of the difference between the two options and check as to what they are getting
Positive_Review: Location was excellent easy to walk to all major attractions in Vienna and very quiet Friendly and helpful staff very clean air conditioning comfortable beds adequate sized room good bathroom facilities Plenty of lovely cafes and restaurants nearby Lovely building and lovely ambience Would recommend

Negative_Review: The flusher for the toilet was falling off the wall of our bathroom but we were able to deal with it every time One morning someone came to clean the room at 8 30am or so and it was fine but we were woken up by it and it was just a bit too early
Positive_Review: The room was fairly basic but considering the value and location it was more than enough We were really only sleeping there we didn t spend much time in the hotel The bathroom was small but it was clean Solid wifi for the time we did spend there too

Negative_Review: Avoid the 6th floor if you want to sleep at all during the night The AC settings cannot be changed without the AC starting to beep and buzz and vibrate at very short and irregular intervals Also avoid the night time receptionist an older gentlemen because all he will tell you is that it is your own fault if you have an early departure time and that nothing can be done which is not what you want to hear after a day that started at 5am was full of meetings and knowing very well you need to get up at 5am again no matter how little you have slept
Positive_Review: Even though I arrived early the receptionist gave me one of the first available rooms so I could head to my meetings and appointments without a suitcase in tow

Negative_Review: We booked for 3 people but only 1 bed in the room The communication was difficult to get an extra bed They happily got us a bed but I m not sure this is common
Positive_Review: Great position we were offered upgraded rooms that were renovated and a little larger for not too much more Quiet location You can park in the street for free on weekends Only 5 mins walk through the parks to the centre of old town vienna We only had 1 day in vienna so a perfect spot to explore the city from

Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: The Reception Staff were excellent Extremely helpful and pleasant Everytime we had a question or query they did all they could to help Well Done The location of the hotel was ideal for us and very close to everything we wanted The hotel was very clean and all staff were very pleasant

Negative_Review: There were no tea and coffee making facilities in the room but staff were happy to provide us with hot water when we requested it
Positive_Review: Staff were extremely friendly and helpful Breakfast staff were very helpful in providing gluten free options at breakfast there were a number of different types of bread offered The hotel was clean and very quiet and had excellent air conditioning It is well located close to public transport and there are some wonderful restaurants nearby

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: We stayed in an executive room as I am a lady of a certain age was very pleased to see a magnifed make up mirror Lovely clean hotel pleasant and helpful staff Really good choices at breakfast Comfy pillows Great location near to underground and easy walking to city centre

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: great experience very nice location beautiful hotel with such an interesting history of the building do ask the hotel manager about it loved the surrounding would definitely stay their again if i get a chance

Negative_Review: Don t have limousine service from city center
Positive_Review: Modern well furnished easy parking possibility close to main museums silent area widely variated breakfast according to an European hotel

Negative_Review: I booked a single room Upon arrival I was offered an upgrade for a fee I declined the offer turned out I got the upgrade anyway They obviously did not have the simple room I booked and tried to get some money extra I found that quite cheap behaviour In the room was a note that if I wanted a coffe tea maker I would only need to inform the front desk and they would bring it So the next day I asked for one Turned out they charged 10 Euro a day for it because I had not booked that specific level of room So first I was given an upgrade I didn t ask for then I had to oay additional for a service that came for free to the room Bad policy Last but not least there s only 1 slow elevator in the hotel At rush hour in the morning people wait for ever Have a room on the 1st or 2nd floor if you Want to avoid that nuisance
Positive_Review: Location nesr Rathaus

Negative_Review: When we opened our toilet there was some one s s t not whole pieces but there s some ew That was the first impression of this hotel I felt ew Except that hotel was okay
Positive_Review: Location

Negative_Review: 2 singles pushed together for the bed card details taken at property without letting me know just Can I see a card please sir and then deducted 30 euro from the card and told me after bit unprofessional The biggest gripe was the 2 single beds the executive room wasn t really very executive it was small and a little cramped in the corner of floor 3 Room 312 my partner works in travel and she wasn t very impressed The Free soft drinks in mini bar option for having the delux room wasn t worth the extra 15 euro a night it s 1 bottle of cola 1 bottle of Orange Juice and 1 bottle of water per day The price you pay is probably not worthit there were hotels of a similar standard for a lot less when booking the exec room I expected a little more Overall I wouldn t re book the property but it was ok
Positive_Review: Staff were good though in general

Negative_Review: Breakfast was a bit too expensive for what you get But the staff was excellent
Positive_Review: The staff was extremely accomodating We have a toddler and have some very specific requirements The staff went beyond our expectations in helping us out Ulrich was extremely professional friendly and helpful and his English is perfect All the 4 star ratings are accurate Keep it up

Negative_Review: One elevator for the hotel
Positive_Review: Fabulous breakfast Excellent staff We had the family room and it was very spacious Overall excellent location and a wonderful hotel Highly recommend to all Will definitely stay again

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The location is amazing it is about a 20 minute walk to the main stephanplatz area however you are still in the Vienna core district 1 The restaurants around are delicious Staff is extremely helpful and knowledgeable The hotel is also near the main metro stops which bring you to Stephanplatz in 7 minutes

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The hotel was close to city centre and the DTram line Nice clean and well appointed rooms Lots of good restaurants close by on University strasse The staff were amazing so friendly and helpful Well done

Negative_Review: The room key electronic was a little flaky The duvet was pretty heavy
Positive_Review: The location was terrific only two blocks to the tram line that leads down to the big Schottentor tram and underground station on the Ring or a three four block walk to the station which is also the beginning of the 1A bus into Stefansdom It is only a couple of blocks the other way for the airport bus The hotel breakfast was pretty pricy but the Stadtkind cafe is nearby and provides a good selection

Negative_Review: Rooms are very very small There is no slipper kettle in the room Briefly the standards of the room is under 4 star hotel May be 3 star
Positive_Review: Rooms are very clean The staff was nice Breakfast was wonderfull Nearest metro station is 300m

Negative_Review: Just a bit far from main attractions
Positive_Review: When we got into our room and found that it did not match with the picture provided so we asked for a change The assistant manager at reception gave us a free upgrade to executive room which is very nice

Negative_Review: Bedroom carpet could have looked cleaner Bedroom door had chipped paint
Positive_Review: Staff were friendly Staff responded to any requests made Fruit available for guests Location was good

Negative_Review: We had an Executive room and it was small cannot imagine what is the size of Comfort class rooms We asked for a king size bed got two twins put together pillows were not comfortable and old Could be an advantage to have heated floors in bathrooms
Positive_Review: Location breakfast wifi speed

Negative_Review: Sink in bathroom to close to toilet despite the space We couldn t find an easy way to sit on the toilet comfortably
Positive_Review: Excellent location near Rathaus and the city centre Metrostation at 200 m from hotel Delicious breakfast

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The location is excellent close to all the major sights especially the Rathaus Burgteater and the Parliament Public transport stations metro U2 and tram are a 3 minute walk from the hotel The room executive one was very nice clean and well appointed Comfortable double bed Breakfast was delicious The staff was very helpful and friendly

Negative_Review: Really nothing
Positive_Review: Marvelous hotel in a quiet street in the city centre I was able to explore the non touristical part of Vienna Historical building high ceilings nice viewing room made me feel like in a real palace The room was clean cosy there were all facilities I will definitely stay here again for a longer time

Negative_Review: The room was outdated overpriced and staffs were really careless Although we booked the hotel through booking with credit card they asked us for credit card and they blocked some money as a guarantee and then they unblock this amount 10 days after we left the hotel with several follow up calls
Positive_Review: location

Negative_Review: I can t think of a thing
Positive_Review: The location near the Ringstrasse was excellent It was close to everything The rooms we had 2 for the whole family were beautiful and well appointed The staff was very helpful and friendly Breakfast was delicious It had lots of options and was kept full and available The beds were very comfortable Overall an excellent experience We would love to stay here when we return to Vienna

Negative_Review: Considering the high price of bakfast at 16 I was slightly unimpressed by the choice and quality of food drink on offer The bread was stale and the orange juice made from concentrate Elsewhere I had breakfast that included freshly baked bread pressed orange juice smoked salmon and prosecco at 70 of the price I paid at the Rathauspark Hotel The coffee was excellent but then bad coffee simply does not exist in Vienna
Positive_Review: Very very helpful multilingual staff Lovely bathroom

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Hotel located around City Hall and University of Wien close to Parlement and Hofburg easy to access city centre by walk Staffs are very friendly and helpful

Negative_Review: Only complaint is there was no tea coffee making facilities included in the room there is the option to pay 10 a day extra for it which seems a bit steep when it s usually included as standard everywhere else Bit surprising for a 4 star hotel
Positive_Review: Room beds were warm comfortable Hotel is in a great location close to sights attractions Good selection of food at breakfast breakfast time is very generous 6 30 10 30

Negative_Review: No possibility to have a drink at the hotel in the evening to watch football meet other people etc There is a bar in the hotel but it s very small and not really inviting
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: The hotel doesn t mention that most of the basic rooms are 12 Sq M only and are quite shabby with noisy ventilation in the bathroom However they do have nice rooms in higher category I would recommend this hotel only if you chose high category room The location is great close to metro station and historical center
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: The room is too small and not provide kettle and electric iron
Positive_Review: Breakfast is really good and worth to try The destination of the hotel is easy to have sightseeing

Negative_Review: Only one lift so some waiting during busy times
Positive_Review: Freindly staff and clean rooms Located close to the main tram line which will take you to most attractions and the center of town Also within walking distance if you prefer to walk Plenty of food choices close by

Negative_Review: the regular room is very small it s smaller than in description so is the bathroom there was no elevator for the first floor we felt that this hotel is overpriced Once again the air conditioner wasn t operative due to the time of the year and it was loud from the cars outside so we had some trouble sleeping though they offered us lighter blankets
Positive_Review: location was great and close to public transportation one tram stop from the U2 Schottentor station breakfast was variant clean and tasty with good service helpful staff

Negative_Review: They were not informed by Booking we arrive with our kind So the couch wasn t prepared for her On the website of the hotel they offer welcome drink free non alcoholic minibar for this room type We didn t get the welcome drink and the free minibar opportunity wasn t offered Seems to be they blocked the amount of the accommodation 1 day before but during the check out I had pay again I don t know yet if they debit the amount twice really
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Having to leave
Positive_Review: Staff were friendly and attentive rooms were lovely clean and comfortable location was in a quiet area but close to everything we needed

Negative_Review: Not the most imaginative breakfast decent but no more than that The bed could be more comfortable
Positive_Review: Quiet street but well located Decently sized room Friendly staff

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Very good location and the stuff All services was on time I suggest this hotel to stay for everyone who want to stay in the center and looking for some not very expensive options

Negative_Review: Classic double bed room is quite small and a bathroom is small as well
Positive_Review: The location of the hotel is perfect almost near the city hall and close to the city center Parking for free during the weekend in front of the hotel entrance is luxuriance

Negative_Review: Their bathroom cannot drain the water away if the water leaks from the showering place even I close the showering door properly the water still leak from the gap all water will only stay there until next morning
Positive_Review: Helpful staffs Room is cozy and warm my window faces to university of Vienna which provided a good view

Negative_Review: Bar area was very small poor in size and ambiance Lounge seemed austere not particularly attractive
Positive_Review: Bedroom size and facilities were very good as were breakfast room food selection and service Friendly staff Very clean well maintained

Negative_Review: Tea and coffee in room would have improved our visit Out of date orange juice in mini bar Dressing table lamp did not work
Positive_Review: Good Breakfast helpful staff in reception and restaurant and rooms Good recommendations for restaurants

Negative_Review: We had to have the hide a bed couch open and it made the room a little tight It would have been perfect for two people but for three it felt like it was all beds
Positive_Review: The staff were extremely friendly and helpful The location is excellent

Negative_Review: Rooms of the same type can vary in size and look Breakfast is average but pricing is not
Positive_Review: Central location very friendly and helpful staff nice room you ll get everything you need at the shower

Negative_Review: The parking is not free during week days
Positive_Review: The Location is really good there is a small bar at the front desk side very nice Parking is free during Weekends but the other time need to be paid

Negative_Review: Can be a bit noisy if someone stays in a room adjacent to yours I heard someone pacing behind the wall
Positive_Review: Just outside the old city Easy to get to Nice staff and room Thank you for a cake for my b day Very polite waiters Cool building calm street

Negative_Review: We were in an attic room where there were no tight window blinds so if you want to sleep in it is not great But it seems that in the rooms on lower floors there were curtains
Positive_Review: Extremely nice and welcoming staff great coffee comfortable bed and fabulous bathroom Location is great Price difficult to beat for the quality and location

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Excellent reception staff service allow us a very late checkout and a small room after 15h30 before organising our taxi to the airport Good breakfast spread very thoughtful staff brought me cake for my birthday

Negative_Review: Would change the pillows
Positive_Review: The hotel is very good great price for the value Would return no doubt Near all museums 1 km except Schonbrunn 4 5 km Excellent breakfast

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The hotel rooms are good only for executive rooms Standard rooms are very old and kind of run down I had to take an upgrade to executive room Once upgraded the hotel is very nice and desreves 8 8 5 range score For standard room 6 5 7 5 range Breakfast was good

Negative_Review: Nothing to dislike
Positive_Review: Staff very helpful and friendly Room Executive was spacious and warm Good choice at breakfast About 15 minutes walk into the city centre U bahn station about 5 minutes walk away

Negative_Review: The standard rooms are too small
Positive_Review: Good hotel in the Vienna center very good location if you want to explore the city center walking Our standard room was incredibly small but the staff was friendly enough to offer us a good price for an upgrade to executive room which was spacious and comfortable The breakfast was excellent Parking is quite far but acceptable comparing to the hotel s location

Negative_Review: I stayed at this hotel within the last year and came back because I had such a good experience It looks like it s kept falling downhill The carpet in the elevator is ripping up from the floor I ve already tripped on it 3 times There also seems to be a lot of variation in the rooms Our last one was bigger with a bath This one is smaller we had to pay 10 more per night to get a room smaller than the one we stayed in last time and has a shower that s too small to bend your elbow in The staff is okay but didn t go out of their way or be extra friendly Construction is going on and we called downstairs when it began at 8 am No one called us back or belayed the construction However when we complained when checking out of the hotel we were comped one free breakfast Also 16 per person for breakfast is highway robbery unless it s something more than toast and cakes Wifi is good enough to check your email but that s it Don t check in here if you ve got business to conduct A Skype call for example is impossible I m just pretty disappointed The price is okay it s not bad enough that I moved hotels we were there for a week but I wouldn t come back again
Positive_Review: The beds are pretty comfortable the hotel is clean the minibar prices are reasonable and the location is pretty good there are restaurants and a grocery store pharmacy ATM nearby The parking garage isn t hard to get to 25 day is still high If you get it for under 100 night it s a good enough deal

Negative_Review: The only reason I marked this down was that the shower was very difficult for my elderly mother to navigate No grab bars and the control knobs for the hot cold were easily bumped as you moved around in the shower
Positive_Review: I was traveling with my 85 year old mother for a Christmas holiday in Europe We loved our room The staff were very helpful and gracious to our needs I want to say that the front desk assistance with getting taxi room service etc was top notch I hope to visit again

Negative_Review: Absence of a queen size bed just two single beds put one next to eatchother
Positive_Review: The location of the property is excelent Big spacious and verry clean rooms

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: We visited Vienna to see the famous Christmas markets but we got bags more than we bargained for we had the most fabulous time I really can t recommend it enough We spent 4 nights at the hotel which was a few minutes from the stunningly beautiful centre where we explored the vast array of culture arts and stunning architecture A simply wonderful break It even snowed Perfect We had a suite a standard room to accommodate 5 of us The suite was fantastic and the time we spent in the hotel other than sleeping was spent in the suite The whole hotel was beautifully clean and the staff were very impressive spoke fluent English and couldn t do enough for us

Negative_Review: I was staying in the room 308 and the room above has very squeaky floors I heard every single step of a person above
Positive_Review: Very good location clean and cosy

Negative_Review: Room was smaller than expected and smaller than picures we had seen but we didn t spend much time in it so it was adequate
Positive_Review: The whole experience Location was excellent within walking distanced of most things we wanted to see visit Breakfasts were wonderful Staff very friendly and helpful Bed VERY comfortable

Negative_Review: My wife s make up remains was not cleaned from the sink after they have cleaned the room
Positive_Review: The staff especially the lady at the front desk at 1st and 2nd Jan morning shift was very friendly Great location

Negative_Review: Very limited choice of snacks room service just soup and toasted sandwiches This was important as my wife was room bound for a day and we had to get some food for her However the friendly staff on the front desk pointed us to Caf Einstein just two block away that do take out food
Positive_Review: Very comfortable hotel well equipped rooms with extremely comfortable beds and very modern bathroom fittings whilst maintaining the old charm of the building The breakfast was amazing such a large range of very fresh and healthy produce Outstanding The check in staff were very helpful My wife contracted a bad flu bug and they helped me find a local doctor who was round at our room within 15 minutes With a pharmacy over the road we had the prescription prepared swiftly Fantastic service Great location with a 10 minute walk into the Altstadt but off a quiet street so very peaceful at night

Negative_Review: perhaps change the blanket they are the only less impressive feature of the room everything else is great
Positive_Review: Strategic location helpful staff comfortable bed

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: I stayed here with my husband and one year old for 4 days As we had a big suite it was more than enough space and convenient for us plus we loved how quiet it was It would have been ideal for my husband and I to have one bed to ourselves instead of 2 small beds side by side It was very clean and lovely decor The proximity of the hotel to major tourist attractions was great and loved that all metro stations have lifts which makes it easy when you have a pushchair We only had breakfast every day at the hotel and maybe a bigger variety of things everyday at the buffet would have been nice different cheeses and more fruit selection no bananas and decaffeinated tea or coffee for those that require it The staff in the hotel were all very friendly and helpful and accommodated us easily Overall we are quite pleased with this hotel and would return in the future

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Good choice of breakfast room and bed was very comfortable The location was excellent within walking distance of all the main attractions The staff were friendly and helpful and we would definitely stay there again

Negative_Review: The room was small and shower was almost clostrophbic The staff on reception were not that helpful on requests of places to eat and I had to ask several times for any reccomedations and still never received any The hotel is 19mins away from the central shopping area and decent restraunts
Positive_Review: The room we booked was clean

Negative_Review: Everything acceptable
Positive_Review: Friendly reception staff location close to inner city room comfortable Unable to comment on breakfast as we ate elsewhere We chose this hotel as it was near large Christmas markets

Negative_Review: We could hear our neighbor room but it was not a problem during the night
Positive_Review: Great room Big cozy and modern Very friendly staff beautiful building and great location

Negative_Review: Parking in 5 mins walk strictly not hotel s but they provide a hotel discount not directly connected to the hotel Air conditioning is operated centrally via hotel and cannot be adjusted in a room
Positive_Review: Very central close to tram metro lines Reception is really helpful

Negative_Review: Very small rooms although to be fair we were out for most of the time It would have been nice to be provided with tea and coffee facilities instead of having to bring our own
Positive_Review: Excellent location and quiet at night Generally very clean well kept and very friendly and informative staff

Negative_Review: Expensive breakfast one morning we had to wait near dining room because it was overcrowded
Positive_Review: Free and fast wi fi good breakfast nice and comfortable beds very pleasant and helpful staff perfect location near Rathaus Christmas market and U bahn station

Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: The staff room and breakfast exceeded all expectations Would recommend this hotel to anyone no one could be disappointed with the standard or service

Negative_Review: Nothing that I can think of
Positive_Review: Very friendly check in and really nice decor throughout We had a lovely attic room which was nice and quiet and cosy They warned us it was a small room but we thought it was fine Right beside the Rathaus which was great for the Christmas markets As Vienna city centre is relatively small the hotel is within walking distance of the main attractions Good buffet breakfast in the morning

Negative_Review: Important notice for the guests the hotel policy is to block on your card the amount for the room on arrival and the at the check out to charge your card again the amount blocked on arrival you ll not received sooner then 5 days in my case I made my check out on Monday 12 December and I haven t receive it not even today
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: We had booked for 3 adults and 1 small child however when we arrived we found the room had only been made up for only three people The staff made another bedding however
Positive_Review: Excellent location although there were virtually no restaurants around Right by the Xmas market at the Rathaus which was perfect Rooms were clean and warm Parking was easy Breakfast was great although it was very crowded in the morning Overall good experience

Negative_Review: I booked a executive room for me and my boyfriend when I arrived in the evening and checked in I realised it was 2 single beds pushed together when I asked for a double bed When I called up the next morning I called down to the reception who said that that s the executive room only has 2 single beds and no double bed which I though was ridiculous for a 4 star hotel So they put me in a classic room however explained my mini bar wouldn t be free even though I paid for this benefit with the executive room When I went down to the reception to talk to someone face to face I was ignored for 10mins waiting as the two meme era of staff was on there computer and talking amounts themselves Once I was acknowledge I explained that I still want to the executive privileges that I paid for they then agreed Also breakfast was another disappointment 16 for some cold meats and mediocre hot breakfast would not recommend this hotel unless your happy to put up with the bad customer service and a great location But they re is other hotels with a similar location for less of the price This place is definitely a rip off and when I checked out they tried charging me for a coke from the mini bar which was included in the executive room price Overall a let down
Positive_Review: The location was great 2min walk from the Christmas market

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: We loved everything The staff was extremely helpful the room was beautiful the breakfast tasty A big Christmas market with an ice rink was literally around the corner and a famous traditional eatery Leopold just a walk away Thank you

Negative_Review: A bit strange blankets pretty small and heavy but it s a matter of taste
Positive_Review: We were surprised and delighted by this hotel as it appeared to be much above the reviews Very good location close to city center comfortable rooms quiet enough for good sleep Very good breakfast and a lot of compliments in the room all the soft drinks from minibar apples and some sweets Very friendly staff ready to help at any occasion

Negative_Review: Couple of staff were not too friendly
Positive_Review: Good location Enough choice for vegetarians in breakfast some of the staff were very helpful namely Dilan and Phillip

Negative_Review: very small room they charged us 10 Euro per night for having a tee service in room which I found not justifiable with the room price
Positive_Review: location breakfast bed

Negative_Review: Every time we had a shower the room flooded as the shower didn t drain fast enough Even with the heat turn off the room was unbearable warm The AC didn t work We paid to be upgraded to an executive room at the hotel and were told the mini bar would be restocked every day as the non alcoholic drinks were included in the price This was not restocked daily
Positive_Review: The location was very close to one of the largest Christmas markets in Vienna

Negative_Review: Rooms are very small the pictures of the hotel have nothing to do with the reality Breakfast is poor The hotel definitely need a renovation
Positive_Review: Location Wifi

Negative_Review: I m travelling often to Vienna and I never found a poor quality hotel like it The rooms are very small and not so comfortable as you can see in the pictures For the same price you can get a better hotel in Vienna
Positive_Review: The location

Negative_Review: This hotel has nothing to do with a four star rating We booked a comfort room and We received a small room of max 2 5 m wide a bed attached to the wall on the side and a bathroom so small where the towels were hanged right above the toilet We couldn t actually move or get dressed in the room There is no sign and no instructions about parking and we park the car in front of the hotel next to other cars Next day we received a parking fee When I asked in the reception what is going on they told me that the parking for the hotel is on the other side of the street I said ok but we should have been told about it or it should have been a sign instructions etc Next day they hanged out a paper with instructions For a 4 star hotel in the center of Wien it was really dissapointing not to say frustrating And for 133 euro night I would expect a little more We ll never book any Austria Trend hotel again
Positive_Review: Excellent location good breakfast Actually these are the only good things about this hotel

Negative_Review: I didnt like the staff the location the facilities and the size of the rooms They gave us a hell smaller room which they later changed on our request The aged person on the reception in evenings was very rude They even charged us for the tea maker
Positive_Review: The female receptionist Katja was the only helpful person in the entire hotel Rooms were ok though very very small

Negative_Review: I could here every step of our neighbors beside and above us which woke me up a few times
Positive_Review: The hotel was very clean and in a good location They also allowed us to check out late for an extra fee of course

Negative_Review: One day at 16 00 o clock the cleaning staff wanted to clean our room at 16 00 The water in the shower was going from too hot to too cold by his own it was very annoying The room was very small for the price 100 per night without breakfast
Positive_Review: The area was wonderful Very beautiful and close to the sights The staff was very friendly and spoke English fluently There was a computer and a printer for individual use near the reception desk

Negative_Review: The receptionist wasn t very friendly when we first arrived Both our heater and aircon wasn t working and he was very impatient when he came up to the room to have a look The room was quite small for the price that we were paying
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Our rooms were located in an area without an elevator I would not expect to climb stairs with my luggage at this stylish hotel Entrace lobby was very small and very crowded at times
Positive_Review: Excellent location Comfortable rooms Good showers Staff friendly and helpful

Negative_Review: Everything was great We couldn t have asked for a better location to see heart of Vienna
Positive_Review: Staff extremely helpful with any questions regarding local transportation They were friendly and responsive to our needs

Negative_Review: The room could do with better lighting a tad dim but that s all Everything else was great
Positive_Review: Lovely clean and modern hotel The staff were very helpful and friendly Location was decent Stayed in the standard room and was surprised how big the room was which even included a walk in closet On our last night the hot water was out for a few hours and was offered free breakfast which was nice when we checked out Would definitely stay again

Negative_Review: A bit expensive for a rather small room No doublebed as asked for no highlevel floor as asked for in booking Slow internet
Positive_Review: Good location serviceminded and friendly staff Very nice and clean hotel Convenient and comfortable lobby overall a good experience

Negative_Review: Location was quite desolate It was not in the inner ring so we had to pay for cabs Also there is no elevator The room also had steps inside The bath room was too small and inconvenient to use Not recommended
Positive_Review: Nothing

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Room size staff and service were fantastic Airport bus stop just up the road Train stations nearby Small walk about 1 5 2km into the main shopping area in town

Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: Everything was perfect I truly loved my stay there The staff members are absolutely amazing and are ready to assist you with whatever you want The room is exactly as described in booking and is more beautiful than the pictures All what you want for a wonderful stay is available The room s amenities are excellent The location is perfect too I had some work at University of Vienna which is just 5 minutes walk from the hotel A big supermarket is right across the street and several many restaurants are located near the hotel Old Vienna and the city center are just 15 minutes walk Many of the tourism attractions including museums are on a walkable distance I strongly recommend this hotel and would love to stay in it again

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: A luxurious hotel with elegant decoration and modern equipment The suite is large and the bed is huge It located in the city center and is very convenient to get anywhere in Vienna either by metro or by walk

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Super staff friendly and helpful throughout our stay Peaceful location with parking right outside but close to the metro and lots of areas of interest We loved Vienna

Negative_Review: Parking is a special rate at the local underground public parking room was small and the receptionist while trying his best was unable to upgrade us to a larger one
Positive_Review: Great location very close to city centre and next to landmark Rathaus

Negative_Review: Charge of 10 euros if you want tea and coffee making facilities
Positive_Review: Staff friendly and accommodating Walking distance to everything Supermarket and restaurants within one block

Negative_Review: Partial shower doors don t make any sense I guess this is the trend in most European countries but a shower curtain could add so much functionality if a full shower door cannot be afforded
Positive_Review: Beautiful room in the city center but away from all the chaos of the city good spread at breakfast very friendly staff and service

Negative_Review: Double bed was in fact jointed twin bed i e could feel an open space between beds while sleeping
Positive_Review: Received extra jam treats in a room upon arrival and a free drink in lobby bar Breakfast is nice Location brilliant

Negative_Review: Please be carefull with hotel taxi Recepsionist ordered taxi finally we cannot use credit card and had to pay only in cash and driver asked bigger amount than recepsionist said
Positive_Review: Breakfast was excelent with clasical music

Negative_Review: Though there was nothing wrong with the room and the lift worked well enough I d have preferred not to be on the top floor
Positive_Review: The location It was literally just behind the Rathaus and in an area where we could walk to many attractions The whole area was full of magnificent buildings Hotel was clean staff were friendly and helpful and the room only deal was good value for money

Negative_Review: In general the amenities were expensive room service parking and breakfast is rather high Also the parking lot is rather far about a 6 minute walk to the hotel
Positive_Review: Wifi is good room was comfortable and staff was super friendly

Negative_Review: Room was quite small and poor sound proofing Air conditioning didn t work and couldn t get fixed since it was a weekend
Positive_Review: Very good breakfast choice Helpful reception staff giving us good restaurant recommendations

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The bed was very comfortable and I like how clean all was Walk in shower was fantastic easy to handle Little Zum Loefeln was very nice too

Negative_Review: Nothing it was great
Positive_Review: Nice hotel in a great location very close to the town hall only a 15 minute walk to the Hofburg palace The room was spacious and very clean with all the amenities you d need Breakfast was a good spread pastries bread cheese sausages eggs bacon fruit cakes cereals Would definitely stay here again

Negative_Review: I got some hives on my back in the morning after the second night a skin rash it looked like an insect had bit me
Positive_Review: I loved Lemar the receptionist who went the extra mile to help me I forgot my phone charger at home and he gave me his own to use for the whole of my stay Thank you again Lemar

Negative_Review: Would be nice if the staff could advise properly that although parking is free around the hotel on weekends there is a restriction that left side of the street is restricted to residents only right side parking is available free
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Cannot say enough good things about the staff Sonja on the front desk was amazing friendly helpful and just a pleasure to talk with Then Kathi was so helpful too she even called a pizza place for us to have it delivered to hotel They were all just so easy and friendly to work with Great job ladies

Negative_Review: No parking Additionally when we asked about where to park the guidance was vague and we got a 30 Euro ticket This hotel needs a map of nearby public parking instead of just telling guests See that building there There should be parking around there
Positive_Review: Comfortable rooms decent location good breakfast buffet

Negative_Review: Only thing that was a minus was the warm rooms There was an air conditioning system but it still felt very warm We went in April and it was very warm outside too
Positive_Review: Great location modern clean and very large room Reception very helpful pretty much cannot fault it ticked all the boxes for a city break

Negative_Review: Carpets in rooms are quite dated
Positive_Review: Location was excellent for anyone participating in or spectating the marathon as it is very close to thetown hall and the finish line Quiet but central location Parking was easy when we arrived on Friday night as we could park on the street outside Check in staff very friendly Hotel would be fine for a business trip

Negative_Review: breakfast too expensive so went to different cafes in vienna instead which we enjoyed
Positive_Review: this hotel was well positioned to metro station in a quiet area of vienna traditional hofbrauhaus close by will have no hesitation in staying here again

Negative_Review: Not wort that value of money 190e for two night without brekfast is too much money for this hotel
Positive_Review: Location is good near to uban station and 1 3km from Stephanplaz free parking

Negative_Review: The room was under the roof quite cold and not that dark but with a nice view on the outside if you re tall enough to reach the window
Positive_Review: Great position and value for money

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The hotel has its warm and comfortable athmosphere The stuff is absolutely amazing especially Natalia from the reception was extremely helpful in all the requests starting from destinations to visit finishing with booking beautiful places for dinners Everyone is friendly and nice

Negative_Review: The quality was not of a four star hotel The blankets in the double bed were separated
Positive_Review: The location was close to the city center and to the subway stop The staff was kind and always ready to help

Negative_Review: The bed was very very unconfortable extremely small room in Wien you can find more hotels for the same value closer to the centre parking is in the public garrage Staffs are very nice
Positive_Review: Just a breakfast was fine

Negative_Review: Standard room is pretty small there was hardly enough space for two
Positive_Review: Really nice and friendly staff very good location 5 minutes from the Rathause and Christmas market Room looked quite cosy though we expected it bigger Good breakfast too

Negative_Review: No one to help with the luggage No kettle to boil water on the room and no tea or coffee maker they will ask for 10 EUROS per day for them No place to park your car in all the street in front of the hotel
Positive_Review: Location is not the best location in Vienna but it s good enough Wireless is very good

Negative_Review: I did not like the fact that the walls were so thin you could hear EVERYTHING We had a crying sick child next door heard everything all night for 3 days Also parking is a few blocks away not on property as advertised not very clear as to where to park We paid 80 for 2 days Alot of money
Positive_Review: I liked the location of this hotel i LOVED the breakfast buffett We paid 16 each every morning it was worth it It was clean spacious Great place

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Perfect location extremely close to the biggest Christmas market in Vienna as well as being a 5 minute walk from the centre of the city Very nice room staff were extremely friendly overall service very swift and hassle free Brilliant Hotel Would visit again

Negative_Review: Staff was a bit stuffy and pro forma with their service For example when asked to break a large euro cash bill they declined saying they didnt have enough cash onhand Really
Positive_Review: Quiet location despite being well located near center city Nice amenities Good beds

Negative_Review: The room was really tiny ok for one or two nights but not more The breakfast was more or less ok however taking into consideration price of 125 Euro per nignt you expect a little bit more usually
Positive_Review: The location is good enough As the main purpose was to visit Rathaus Christmas Market it was really convinient to do from here 10 15 minutes by foot

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Breakfasts were excellent very good choice of well cooked and prepared food Rooms were comfortable and warm Good choice of bathroom extras Quick lift

Negative_Review: After paying a high price due to the location and high demand for the Christmas Market which is understandable I was charged 10 per day for the use of a kettle which was absurd We had our 8 month old daughter with us and we needed hot water for her bottles The fact that we were charged for the kettle was just unfair and shallow It ruined my whole experience with this hotel chain
Positive_Review: Location was great next to the Rathausplatz for the big Christmas Market

Negative_Review: Pictures of the rooms are very very deceiving We were shocked at how small the rooms are compared to what the pictures show Staff argued that the description of the room says how many square meters the room is which doesnt make much sense as I don t know anyone who says I booked a 25m2 room in a hotel but I know a lot of people that say the hotel website has amazing pictures I booked it I suggest to put realistic pictures or remove them We were offered a 10 discount for a future booking it won t happen We would have been happy if a discount was offered for this stay not the next one
Positive_Review: The location was great staff was nice hotel was is beautiful like all of Vienna

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Hotel is well situated within 15 mins walk of the town centre but near to the park in a relatively quiet location The buffet breakfast was very excellent great value for money

Negative_Review: Some communication problems with a delivery I was receiving Little things took the polish off the otherwise elegant hotel unless super careful the shower could leak all over bathroom soap dispenser kept falling off the wall no iron in room Why are hotel laundries so expensive
Positive_Review: Really easy to get around the city from here

Negative_Review: Room was non smoking but smoke kept coming under the door from other rooms No electricity socket in bathroom Very small shower with taps on the narrow walk so when I turned round in the shower I would often know the tap making the water very hot or turning it off Very small room which was ok if room had been was a bit cheaper Cetnral location bit not much happening on streets around the hotel as mostly business area
Positive_Review: Staff very responsive Breakfast good Clean and tidy Free wifi

Negative_Review: No central light only few lamps Only 3 power sockets per room all occupied with lamps so inconvenient if you need to charge several devices at the same time Cleaning service was just awful though manager tried to appologize
Positive_Review: Location of this hotel is really good as well as the sunrise view if you re lucky to get room with windows facing Rathause street

Negative_Review: A hotel without a soul A generally speaking cold feeling The bottle with liquid soap in the bathroom was empty OK there was another in the shower Poor number of TV channels
Positive_Review: Locaton is perfect Hotel is clean room was OK Breakfast within expectations Very friendly staff A big flat TV monitor

Negative_Review: Room a little bit small
Positive_Review: Near the rathaus and Hofburg walking distance to most of the tourist sites in the old town Clean hotel and helpful staff Wifi is ok

Negative_Review: The staff was not all smiles and helpful The garage was quite far away There was a few road blocks that day and it made it more difficult to get to the garage and the staff handled it just matter of factly and we had to detour another 10km to get back It s not that near the center of the city about 20 30 mins walk And the staff didn t give directions on how to get there besides walking we have an elderly couple in our group and an infant more directions and instructions would have been appreciated
Positive_Review: It was comfortable It has air conditioning and the area was nice and safe

Negative_Review: they were rude and had lack of information about the town they told us if we want to bring yr luggage to yr room we charge u 5 Euro and lots more we said we need a hot water please give us atleast a coffee maker and they said 10 Euro more and lots more at first the gave us very bad and small room because we said we paid room with air condition and they said this is it with yr price we paid 150 Euro per night for 3 nights 448 Euro and they said hotel is 4 star
